Title: ReflectionTools
Description: Take the pain out of dealing with Reflection APIs from .NET.  Includes Win32 and WinRT support.  Build against .NET 4.5
HomeWiki:
ReflectionTools

A rather large collection of helper functions to help with common, and not so common reflection tasks. Useful functionality includes:
  • Property Expression Support i.e. (x => x.MyProp)
  • Type Conversion Improved type conversion that isn't supported via System.Convert, etc.
  • Attribute Support Easily discover and resolve attributes on types and members.
  • WinRT Support Some of the tools have been ported to work with WinRT / Win8. Development for this platform is ongoing.
